name: Need for Speed Most Wanted Android OBB Size File
summary: A SIZE file is a plain text file that the Android version of Need for Speed Most Wanted uses to confirm the size of its .OBB file. It is stored in Need for Speed Most Wanted's assets folder.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

android.display_name: EA Need for Speed Most Wanted

windows.display_name: EA Need for Speed Most Wanted
